H0.text: Brian Connelly was the lead singer with which group. The Tremeloes

H1.text: Brian Connelly was the lead singer with which group. Thin Lizzy

H2.text: Brian Connelly was the lead singer with which group. Mud

H3.text: Brian Connelly was the lead singer with which group. SWEET

A4.text: Gillan's and Cully's eventual replacement, in late 1966, was Scots-born vocalist Brian Connolly, who hailed more recently from Harefield.

A5.text: On 23 February 1979, Brian Connolly's departure from Sweet was formally announced by manager David Walker.
